personality.vicious.name: Vicious
personality.vicious.description: Vicious horses tend to kick or bite harder when provoked.
personality.down_trodden.name: Down Trodden
personality.wild.name: Wild
personality.wild.description: Wild horses are swift, but refuse more often.
personality.energetic.name: Energetic
personality.energetic.description: Energetic horses are swift and are pretty good at jumping.
personality.slothful.name: Slothful
personality.slothful.description: Slothful horses are slow and weak.
personality.gluttonous.name: Gluttonous
personality.gluttonous.description: Gluttonous horses eat all the time, but have more health.
personality.brave.name: Brave
personality.brave.description: Brave horses regenerate health faster and are naturally damage resistant.
personality.bouncy.name: Bouncy
personality.bouncy.description: Bouncy horses are really good at jumping.
personality.stubborn.name: Stubborn
